column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////It's too euro-lounge and nearly trimmed...brightly lit
column2: rubber stamp design inside and ultra clean. What makes that area of Houston so great are places like Brasil
column9: dirty and proud of it. This bakery is very out of place and feels like someone proudly dropped a Starbucks or a Chipotle in the middle of a great hipster intersection.
